name: nativescript-numeric-keyboard
description: Handy and elegant numeric keyboard for iOS NativeScript apps. On Android we fall back to the regular numeric keyboard.

scripts.build: npm i && ts-patch install && npm run tsc
scripts.demo.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-numeric-keyboard && tns plugin add ../src && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && tns build ios
scripts.development.setup: npm run setup && npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-numeric-keyboard && cd ../src
